title: Kalki
summary: Kalki (Sanskrit: कल्किः), also called Kalkin,[1] is the prophesied tenth incarnation of Hindu god Vishnu to end the Kali Yuga, one of the four periods in the endless cycle of existence (Krita) in Vaishnavism cosmology. The end of Kali Yuga states this will usher in the new epoch of Satya Yuga in the cycle of existence, until the MahaPralaya (the Great Dissolution of the Universe).[1][2]
